com.stabilit.sc.cln.scmp
Class SCMPSession

java.lang.Object
  com.stabilit.sc.scmp.SCMP
      com.stabilit.sc.cln.scmp.SCMPSession

public class SCMPSession
extends SCMP

The Class SCMPSession. Represents a connection to a server. Can be registered in an internal registry.

Author:
JTraber
